title: Ifraim Alija
text:
Ifraim Alija (<a href="Serbo-Croatian">Serbo-Croat</a>: "Ifrajim Alija") (born 30 August 1985 in <a href="SFR%20Yugoslavia">SFR Yugoslavia</a>) is a Kosovan-born Swiss <a href="Association%20football">football</a>er who plays for <a href="FC%20Uzwil">FC Uzwil</a>.
He played his only match in Super League 2003–04 season.
